Title: CARE - AI based Animal Reidentification Desktop Application (2025)
Description: Redesigned the UI/UX and built high-fidelity prototypes for a legacy Electron desktop app managing 200,000+ camera trap images. Developed galleries with grid/list views, pagination, folder tree, multi-selection, and thumbnails, while optimizing performance and resolving legacy bugs. Leveraged existing AI-based animal detection and reidentification, integrated the frontend with Node/Electron IPC, and applied HCI-driven design.

Title: Podcast Library Web Application (2024)
Description: University Agile project. A full-stack podcast web app allowing users to browse, search, and manage playlists. Built Flask backend with authentication, integrated SQL database via ORM, and implemented podcast browsing and playlist features. Led GitHub collaboration and supported teammates with debugging.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, Flask, SQLAlchemy ORM, SQLite

Title: NZSL Web Application for Beginners (2024)
Description: Web application for beginner learners of New Zealand Sign Language (NZSL). Built RESTful API in C#/.NET Core to provide structured access to signs and events. Developed front-end using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS with features like searchable sign dictionary, interactive event calendar, guestbook, and user registration/login with client-side session management. Focused on intuitive and accessible UI/UX.
